verses.text: \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3808"\w* \w refrain|strong="H3808"\w* \w himself|strong="H3045"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* many \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w*: whereupon \w he|strong="H3808"\w* commanded \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* stranger \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w present|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*, \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Pharao \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*: \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*? \w His|strong="H6440"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, being struck \w with|strong="H0413"\w* exceeding great fear.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* mildly \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Come|strong="H5066"\w* nearer \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H5066"\w* \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w your|strong="H0834"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* afraid, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w seem|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* hard \w case|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w into|strong="H4376"\w* these countries: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w into|strong="H4376"\w* Egypt \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* preservation.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w two|strong="H2088"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* began \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* upon \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* remain, \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w can|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w neither|strong="H0369"\w* ploughing \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* reaping.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* preserved \w upon|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* food \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* counsel \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* hither, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w who|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Pharao, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* governor \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Gessen: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, thou \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* feed thee, (\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* remaining), \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w both|strong="H3605"\w* thou perish, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* speaketh \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H0001"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w make|strong="H5046"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w bring|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H3190"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fame \w was|strong="H1004"\w* abroad \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* king’s \w court|strong="H1004"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Pharao \w with|strong="H1004"\w* all \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w glad|strong="H3190"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* leave \w nothing|strong="H0408"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* household stuff: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* riches \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* yours.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* bid. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Pharao’s \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w provisions|strong="H6720"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0834"\w*, \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w side|strong="H7307"\w*, \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w order|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w revived|strong="H2421"\w*,
